professional_summary: Motivated and dependable professional with experience in software development and database administration. An adaptable leader that can work independently and collaborate and communicate with team members, management, and customers to ensure productivity.

key_responsibilities: Programmed and maintained web applications.
Achieved constant communication with the customer to ensure satisfaction.
Collaborated regularly with team members and customer on delivery of web applications.
Administered daily meetings to ensure working in an agile workplace.
Attained statistical reports using SQL
Excel
and SSRS for customers to enhance productivity.
Formulated T-SQL queries to inquire the correct data from our databases to embed into developed applications and reports.
Constructed and implemented failover clusters using SQL Server to implement zero downtime for our SharePoint system.
Scheduled SQL jobs of the databases to perform transactional
log
and differential backups.
Assisted the Cyber team on the upkeep of the SQL Servers to be in compliance with the SQL STIG.
Development and review of software life cycle documents such as software requirements specifications
software design descriptions
hazards analysis
trace matrix
etc.
Implementation of software design with SCADA systems into source code.
Develop and migrate SCADA systems by using WinCC OA.
Maintenance of software and documents to implement changes resulting from either control system changes or correction of test deficiencies;
Assure functional deliveries are properly placed under software configuration management.
Interpret I synthesize process control system design into written requirements based on upstream engineering documents and technical specifications.
Taught mathematics to students at the high school level.
Developed and implemented lesson plans and teaching strategies aligned with curriculum goals.
Managed classroom operations including attendance
grading
and parent communication.
Provided additional academic support for struggling students through tutorials and one-on-one sessions.
